verbs.description: [ARG0: Mexican President Enrique Peña Nieto] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [V: fired] [ARGM-DIR: back] [ARG1: at President Trump] [ARG2: for renewing his claim that Mexico would pay for Trump 's proposed border wall " in the end . " " NO . Mexico will NEVER pay for a wall . Not now , not ever] , " Peña Nieto wrote on Twitter . " Sincerely , Mexico ( all of us ) . " ...
